# amitFuncs

Random functions that don't have a permanent home yet. For now it's more or less a mishmash of functionality. [See the site](https://datastrategist.github.io/amitFuncs/reference/index.html) for more info. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of amitFuncs from github by using:

``` {r}
# remotes::install_github("DataStrategist/amitFuncs")
```
